resources.string: Choose which port to use when serving files
Scan the code or type in a browser:
Error to enabling hotspot, try to start it manually from phone settings
License details for open source software
Tap and hold a directory to set it as Inbox
Please note: If mobile data is enabled, it will be shared too
Hold the devices together (usually back to back) and then tap on your screen
You don\'t have permission to set this as Inbox folder
Sync audio playback in all devices
Android devices have different latencies, try this to sync them
Warning: This is a beta version. Using this application may result in tearing a hole in time, as well as damaging objects, unfriendly people and animals. Please feel free to report bugs anyway!
I can\'t set the inbox folder, you have no write permission
No connection to show the online help
Unable to play: Supported only mp3 file
Soundbeam is not supported by this browser, try using one of following:
Slide slowly untile you don\'t ear an echoless sound
Before do this you need start a music/video

This app was renamed from WifiQr to IPCast and now includes many great new features such as:

 • Send apps to others
 • Display photos in a remote device (tap and hold)
 • Stream music and video over devices (tap and hold)
 • SoundBeam: Sync audio playback between multiple devices (currently supported in Chrome, Firefox and Opera browers)
 • Create playlists containing both audio and video files

 This update also brings a brand new look and fixes multiple issues.
